summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) staff discussing whether they obtained prison calls or emails from Jeffrey Epstein while he was at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). The correspondence reveals that Epstein had no recorded calls or emails, aside from an unrecorded call on August 9, and that he never set up his phone or email system at the MCC.

events.title: Email inquiry about Epstein's MCC communications
events.description: SDNY staff exchange emails discussing whether they requested or obtained any prison calls or emails from Jeffrey Epstein while he was incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).

events.title: Unrecorded call at MCC
events.description: Reference to an unrecorded phone call involving Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center on August 9, 2019.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein had no recorded phone calls or emails while incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
Epstein never set up his phone or email system at the MCC.
There was an unrecorded phone call involving Epstein at the MCC on August 9, 2019.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) inquired about obtaining Epstein's prison communications as part of their investigation.
All correspondents in the email chain are redacted, indicated by placeholders like (USANYS).
